title: 3D Interactive Trader Education Website Frontend Implementation

requirements.summary: Design and implement a visually immersive 3D hero environment using React Three Fiber with dark futuristic trading floor aesthetic
acceptanceCriteria: Landing page renders a 3D interactive scene with visible candlestick or chart elements
Scene uses gold/amber accent colors on a dark background
Animated particles or floating elements are present in the scene
Page is responsive and performs smoothly

file_operations.description: Create a React Three Fiber canvas component rendering a dark futuristic 3D trading floor scene with floating candlestick formations, animated particle systems, and gold/amber accent colors. Wire the generated hero background image frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-bg.dim_1920x1080.png as a texture or backdrop element in the scene.
Create the homepage component that renders the Hero3D scene at the top, followed by the module card navigation system. Use clean modern typography with gold/amber accents on near-black background.
Wire the Home page as the root route and set up React Router routes for all module pages (SMT, ICT, PriceAction, Indicators). Remove default template content.
Add global dark theme styling with gold/amber accent color variables, near-black background, and modern typography setup for the entire application.

requirements.summary: Create a 3D interactive module card navigation system displaying four learning modules in a carousel or grid
acceptanceCriteria: Four module cards are visible: SMT, ICT, Price Action, Indicators
Cards have 3D hover/tilt animations
Clicking a card navigates to that module's detail page
Cards display module title, a short tagline, and an icon or visual

file_operations.description: Create a 3D module card component using React Three Fiber that floats in 3D space with hover tilt animations and transition effects. Accept props for module title, tagline, visual, and navigation target. Wire the generated candlestick hero image frontend/public/assets/generated/candlestick-hero.dim_800x400.png as a texture for appropriate module cards.

Create a carousel or grid container component that renders four ModuleCard3D instances for SMT, ICT, Price Action, and Indicators modules. Include navigation handlers that route to respective module detail pages.
Integrate the ModuleCarousel component below the Hero3D scene on the homepage.

requirements.summary: Build an SMT learning module page with sections on definition, core principles, visual diagrams, and concept summary
acceptanceCriteria: SMT module page is accessible from the homepage card
Page contains at minimum 3 educational sections on SMT concepts
At least one visual/diagram is rendered to illustrate SMT logic
A summary or key takeaways section is present

file_operations.description: Create the SMT module page with sections covering: definition and origin, core principles (liquidity sweeps, institutional order flow, displacement), interactive 3D or 2D annotated chart diagrams, and a concept summary card. Use static educational content.
Create a reusable component that renders annotated chart diagrams for educational concepts, supporting both 3D (React Three Fiber) and 2D (SVG) rendering modes.
Wire the SMTModule page to the /smt route in the router configuration.

requirements.summary: Build an ICT learning module page with sections on methodology, core concepts, annotated examples, and summary
acceptanceCriteria: ICT module page is accessible from the homepage card
Page covers at minimum: order blocks, fair value gaps, market structure, kill zones
Visual examples or diagrams illustrate each concept
Navigation back to homepage is available

file_operations.description: Create the ICT module page with sections covering: ICT methodology definition, core concepts (order blocks, fair value gaps, market structure, kill zones, optimal trade entry), annotated visual examples using the ConceptDiagram component, and a summary section. Include navigation back to homepage.
Wire the ICTModule page to the /ict route in the router configuration.

requirements.summary: Build a Price Action learning module page with sections on candlestick patterns, support/resistance, trends, and breakouts with animated visualizations
acceptanceCriteria: Price Action module page is accessible from the homepage card
At least 4 candlestick pattern types are explained
Animated or interactive chart visualization is present
Support/resistance and trend content is included

file_operations.description: Create the Price Action module page with sections on: candlestick patterns (pin bar, engulfing, doji, and at least one more), support and resistance, trend identification, and breakout patterns. Include 3D or stylized 2D animated candlestick chart visualizations rendered with React Three Fiber or SVG.
Create an animated candlestick chart component using React Three Fiber or SVG that demonstrates various candlestick patterns with smooth transitions and animations.
Wire the PriceActionModule page to the /price-action route in the router configuration.

requirements.summary: Build a Technical Indicators learning module page covering MA, RSI, MACD, Bollinger Bands, and Volume with visual chart mockups
acceptanceCriteria: Indicators module page is accessible from the homepage card
At minimum 5 indicators are covered: MA, RSI, MACD, Bollinger Bands, Volume
Each indicator includes a chart or visual mockup
Practical reading tips are included for each

file_operations.description: Create the Indicators module page with sections covering: Moving Averages (SMA/EMA), RSI (Relative Strength Index), MACD, Bollinger Bands, and Volume. Each indicator includes a brief explanation, how to read it, practical tips, and a visual chart mockup rendered using React Three Fiber or SVG.
Create a reusable component that renders indicator chart mockups (lines, histograms, bands) using React Three Fiber or SVG for various technical indicators.
Wire the IndicatorsModule page to the /indicators route in the router configuration.

requirements.summary: Implement a persistent navigation bar with glass-morphism effect and links to all learning modules
acceptanceCriteria: Navbar is visible on all pages
Navbar contains links to: Home, SMT, ICT, Price Action, Indicators
Glass-morphism or translucent dark styling is applied
Active link is visually highlighted

file_operations.description: Create a persistent navigation bar component with semi-transparent glass-morphism effect. Include links to Home, SMT, ICT, Price Action, and Indicators pages. Display the app name/logo using the generated logo mark frontend/public/assets/generated/logo-mark.dim_256x256.png. Highlight the active link based on current route.
Integrate the Navbar component so it appears persistently across all routes in the application.
Add glass-morphism utility classes and styles for the navigation bar (backdrop-blur, translucent background, border styling).

requirements.summary: Display module completion progress on homepage and allow users to mark modules complete from module pages
acceptanceCriteria: Homepage shows visual progress state per module card
Completed modules show a distinct visual state (e.g., glowing ring, checkmark)
Each module page has a 'Mark as Complete' button
Completion state is fetched from the backend on load

file_operations.description: Create a custom hook that fetches all module completion progress from the backend using getAllModuleProgress() and provides methods to mark modules complete via markModuleComplete(). Handle loading and error states.

Enhance the ModuleCard3D component to accept a completion status prop and render a visual progress indicator (glowing ring or checkmark) when the module is marked complete. Use distinct visual state for completed modules.
Integrate the useModuleProgress hook to fetch completion statuses from the backend and pass the appropriate completion state to each ModuleCard3D instance.
Create a 'Mark as Complete' button component that calls the markModuleComplete backend function when clicked. Style it to match the dark futuristic theme with gold/amber accents.
Add the CompleteButton component at the bottom of the SMT module page, passing the module ID 'smt'.
Add the CompleteButton component at the bottom of the ICT module page, passing the module ID 'ict'.
Add the CompleteButton component at the bottom of the Price Action module page, passing the module ID 'priceAction'.
Add the CompleteButton component at the bottom of the Indicators module page, passing the module ID 'indicators'.
